mapper.update: UPDATE check_in_out SET check_out = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}::uuid
UPDATE check_in_out SET work_time = check_out - check_in, late = check_in - '08:30:00'::time, soon = '17:30:00'::time - check_out, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}::uuid;
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM check_in_out WHERE TO_CHAR("date", 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{date} AND employee_id = #{employeeId}::uuid

SELECT employee.code AS code, employee.name AS name, employee.room AS room, employee.unit AS unit, TO_CHAR(date, 'dd-MM-yyyy')as date, TO_CHAR(check_in, 'hh24:mm:ss')as check_in, TO_CHAR(check_out, 'hh24:mm:ss')as check_out, TO_CHAR(work_time, 'hh24:mm:ss')as work_time, TO_CHAR(late, 'hh24:mm:ss')as late, TO_CHAR(soon, 'hh24:mm:ss')as soon, check_in_out.status, check_in_out.id, check_in_out.employee_id FROM check_in_out LEFT JOIN employee ON check_in_out.employee_id = employee.id
and "room" ILIKE CONCAT('%' || #{room} || '%')
and "date" ILIKE CONCAT('%' || #{date} || '%')
and "unit" ILIKE CONCAT('%' || #{unit} || '%')
and "status" ILIKE CONCAT('%' || #{status} || '%')
and "employee_id" = #{employeeId}::uuid
